Name: Dark Duel Legends: Part I
Description: Rumor has it that at midnight, in the station, people engage in “Dark Duels,” battles waged with souls and lives. You decide to investigate the rumor yourself…
QuestDesc: Rumor has it that at midnight, in the station, people engage in “Dark Duels,” battles waged with souls and lives. You decide to investigate the rumor yourself…

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... If my intel is correct... Then this should be the place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Oh, it's you, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you also here for the rumor?

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The one about the tunnel. Something about someone holding Peaks of Prestige "dark duels" here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is said that duelists resentful of being defeated gather here. They are said to have abandoned the fair spirit of dueling and will do anything to gain strength, even if it means falling into darkness.

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At midnight, they duel each other in a secret place inside the tunnel. And the loser is... Well, I've heard several versions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The most believable one is that the loser is deprived of their deck, so they can never duel again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the more terrifying one goes that participants wager their very souls, and the loser has to relinquish theirs for the winner to feast on.

Options.PlotLineKey: Lahai-Roi isn't a land of lawlessness.

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I think it sounds ridiculous, too, but these rumors didn't just come from thin air. Several members of the fan club had already received invitations from a mysterious figure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Want more power? Then come to the station at midnight!"

Options.PlotLineKey: Leave it to me, I'll handle it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Be careful, {PlayerName}... though I doubt any duelist could defeat you in fair play.

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if the rumors are true, and these dark duels are really fought with lives and souls at stake... the duelists may have unseemly methods up their sleeves.

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way! There's a Roya named Alkain in the station. He seems to know something about these "dark duels."

Dialogues.Speaker: Plínio
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But he's wary of me. I couldn't get any useful information out of him… Maybe you'll have better luck than I did.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...An unfamiliar face. Who are you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Duel...? But your eyes already speak of untold strength.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We only accept those... left with nothing. You should not be here. Go duel somewhere else.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alkain studies you, pondering for a moment before giving a small nod.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: More power... Powerful as you are, the desire for more power... is forever insatiable.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tell me, what will you give to get more power?

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...You'd give your soul for a game? Don't be ridiculous.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...You'd give your life for a game? Is that really necessary?

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...You'd give everything? It's just a game... Don't take it too seriously.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This answer is... passable. I'll accept it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See, I was once a loser myself. Duel me first and show me how powerful you really are.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Halt... Enough. I was not wrong about you... You are powerful.

Options.PlotLineKey: ...So that was the so-called dark duel?
So your life and soul belong to me now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What? Dark duel...? How did such a ridiculous idea ever get into your head...

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stop joking. How did such a ridiculous idea ever get into your head...

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...There is no dark duel at all. And there are no stakes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You explain why you're here to Alkain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I see. Those are some wild rumors.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some of them are true. As you can see, we do pursue power because we were all losers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We wanted to compete in the regional tournament, but we got eliminated in the preliminaries because we were too weak... But we didn't give up...

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, we come here after work to share dueling techniques, practice with each other, and hone our skills.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Being defeated is pretty embarrassing, so we didn't make a big deal of it. Instead, we plan to redeem ourselves after finishing our training.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And now the whole thing got spun into wild tales about dark duels.

Options.PlotLineKey: It's scary how gossip can run amok.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, right, we also have two powerful duelists here. They're definitely not losers like me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They wanted to help train us after learning that we were practicing Peaks of Prestige here. They also assess whether our skills have grown sufficiently to avenge ourselves against our previous opponents.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They'd probably be very interested in a good duelist like you… If you're looking for opponents who can match your skill and help sharpen your edge, they might be a perfect fit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alkain
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: May you go from strength to strength, mighty duelist.
